channel.title: Six on Peter's weblog

item.title: Test-Page-Six
item.description:
Creating a new site

Now that the Hugo CLI is installed and ready to go, you can create your new site with this simple command:

hugo new site Myblog

cd /home/sysadmin/Myblog/themes

git clone https://github.com/Vimux/Mainroad.git

To start the static site generator, use the following command: hugo server -D

date +%d-%m-%Y-%H

Using the built-in Hugo server
